ygData.msgSnippet: War heard the message. He sent out a comm coded to all the council members at the battle. Put down your visors or close your eyes now!!!!!!! he sent a solar

Subject: War-comm to all council

 War heard the message. He sent out a comm coded to all the council members 
at the battle. "Put down your visors or close your eyes now!!!!!!!" he sent a 
solar flare grenade. It should take out the alliance's optics for a few 
secinds. no matter where they stood the alliance members would be affected at 
least a little. He pulled down his visor as the flare went off.
